web_snippets: Sarah Elisabeth Sawyer is a story archaeologist. She digs up shards of past lives, hopes, and truths, and pieces them together for readers today.
Sarah Elisabeth Sawyer is a story archaeologist. She digs up shards of past lives, hopes, and truths, and pieces them together for readers today.
Indie author Sarah Elisabeth Sawyer shares why she chose the indie publishing route and why it's been the right choice for her writing career.
